verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yadharadhavantulu daani choosi santoshinturu Mosamu cheyu vaarandaru mounamugaa nunduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Buddhimanthudu ee vishayamula naalochinchunu Yehovaa krupaatishayamula dalanchedaru gaaka{/lang-eng}
